categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Colin Hunt is an English actor who played a Snowtrooper in Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, and portrayed Orrimaarko, a Endor Rebel, a Stormtrooper, Giran during the scene where he mourns with Maliiki over the death of his Rancor, and a Gamorrean Guard who gets Force choked by Luke Skywalker in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi.
